channel.title: Vanguard News » Entertainment
channel.description: A Nigerian newspaper and Online version of the Vanguard, a daily publication in Nigeria covering Niger delta, general national news, politics, business, energy, sports, entertainment, fashion,lifestyle human interest stories, etc

item.title: My music says a lot beyond moving your body – Eva
item.dc:creator: Femi Ajasa
item.description:
Female hip hop star, Eva Alordiah is no doubt a talented rapper. The enterprising entertainer who was once romantically linked with Ice Prince has opened up on the reason why her music is much more mature compared to when she started out.

The post My music says a lot beyond moving your body – Eva appeared first on Vanguard News.

item.title: Watch Video: Alicia keys dance to ‘Ojuelebga’ by Wizkid
item.dc:creator: Femi Ajasa
item.description:
Multiple Grammy award-winning couple, Alicia Keys and her husband Kasseem Dean, popularly known as Swizz Beatz on Tuesday took to Instagram to share the album cover of Wizkid's 2014 album, Ayo (Joy) with the hastag #vibes, mentioning the instagram of Wizkidayo.

The post Watch Video: Alicia keys dance to ‘Ojuelebga’ by Wizkid appeared first on Vanguard News.

item.title: Marriage is a beautiful experience – Paul Okoye
item.dc:creator: johnabayomi2
item.description:
By Benjamin Njoku One of the sensational music duo, Psquare’s Paul Okoye has described Marriage as “a beautiful experience”, saying unless you are married you will hardly discover the truth about it. Paul got married to his loving wife, Anita, last year. In a brief chat with WG, the superstar said, “I never knew it’s

The post Marriage is a beautiful experience – Paul Okoye appeared first on Vanguard News.

item.title: Day I drove car in only pant and bra – Empress Sosanya
item.dc:creator: Femi Ajasa
item.description:
Budding Yoruba actress and marketing graduate of Lagos State University, Empress Anu Sosanya is beautiful, talented and daring. Ask her to describe herself, she would tell you she's a very simple person, who can be very blunt.

The post Day I drove car in only pant and bra – Empress Sosanya appeared first on Vanguard News.

item.title: ‘I don’t really enjoy sex, I prefer romance’
item.dc:creator: Femi Ajasa
item.description:
When Nollywood upcoming actress, Hannah Ogundare is in her element, she plays hardly with any rules. Tall, beautiful and sexy the actress has got the goods not only to play with sensibility of her fans but also to knock them out as she recently did in a photo shoot that sent the internet into an uproar.

The post ‘I don’t really enjoy sex, I prefer romance’ appeared first on Vanguard News.

item.title: Iyanya, Chidinma other past winners unite as Project Fame 8 takes off
item.dc:creator: Tony Chinonso
item.description:
The winner of the competition will walk away with a grand prize of N5m, a brand new SUV and a recording deal worth millions of Naira. The 1st runner up will get a saloon car and N3m. The 2nd runner up will be awarded a brand new saloon car along with N1m while the 3rd runner up will receive a cash prize of N1m.

The post Iyanya, Chidinma other past winners unite as Project Fame 8 takes off appeared first on Vanguard News.

item.title: Who is the best music youngster of the streets: Korede Bello, Kiss Daniel, Lil Kesh or Reekado Banks
item.dc:creator: Femi Ajasa
item.description:
The success of an artiste is said to be measured according to the acceptance of his/her songs on the streets. This generation of music lovers most often than not, careless whether the songs have meanings or not, all they desire is a rhythm they can flow with and dance to. Dbanj, Psquare, Davido, Wizkid, Kcee, Iyanya and even Olamide among others have all paid their dues in his respect and are smugly sitting in the zenith of Nigeria's music ladder. They have all won in the streets and have moved onto higher plane.

The post Who is the best music youngster of the streets: Korede Bello, Kiss Daniel, Lil Kesh or Reekado Banks appeared first on Vanguard News.

item.title: P-square, others top list of 2nd edition of AFRIMMA in Dallas
item.dc:creator: adekunle
item.description:
Nigerian artistes topped the list of the 2nd edition of the African Muzik Magazine Awards (AFRIMMA) scheduled for Dallas in October.

The post P-square, others top list of 2nd edition of AFRIMMA in Dallas appeared first on Vanguard News.

item.title: 2Face, Faze reunite at Makurdi Music Star Trek
item.dc:creator: Femi Ajasa
item.description:
2Face and Faze of the defunct Plantashun Boyz. The duo took to the stage to perform a number of their old numbers.

The post 2Face, Faze reunite at Makurdi Music Star Trek appeared first on Vanguard News.

item.title: 2face reveals his best Nigerian artist
item.dc:creator: Abiodun Alade
item.description:
Innocent Ujah Idibia known as 2face has revealed his best artiste in Nigeria.The pop star and African queen crooner, who is regarded as a legend in the industry took to his Twitter handle to announce the artiste that he admired the most in the country

The post 2face reveals his best Nigerian artist appeared first on Vanguard News.
